name: SSF15
title: Site-Specific Factor 15
subtitle: Assessment Method of Femoral Inguinal Nodal Status
notes:
**Note 1:**  The assessment results are recorded in **Site Specific Factor 14, Femoral Inguinal Nodal Status**.

**Note 2:**  Use the highest applicable code.
rows:
Radiography, imaging 
(Ultrasound (US), CT Scan (CT), magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), PET Scan (PET))
